RiverSafe

RiverSafe Solutions is an innovative and highly dynamic company with vast resources of highly skilled COREN, NSE, NACE, LmechE, ASNT registered and registrable Engineers in relevant Engineering disciplines with tailored solutions to the problems of the clients.

In order to carry on the business successfully as a Leading Edge in the Oil Gas/Energy sector, RiverSafe has her technical subdivisions registered in:

Houston Texas: RiverSafe Solutions LLC File 83323360 To provide engineering and procurement support.

Dubai, United Arab Emirates RiverSafe Engineering services license 829261 providing engineering product design, geographical/Facility 3 D laser.

Ghana: RiverSafe Engineering order to carry on the business successfully as a Leading Edge.

RiverSafe Overview

In January 2018 RiverSafe procured her own Leica P20 3D Laser Scanner to boost her participation as a local content compliant company to carry out:

3D Laser Scanning and Modeling for executing

Facility /Plant As-Built Documentation

Architectural and Building Structures

GIS Data Development

Topography services/Survey in the Energy and Construction Industries

We are servicing globally

What level of Engineering Service do you provide?

RiverSafe is a one stop shop for:
  • Engineering Studies
  • Detailed Engineering Design
  • As-Built Documentation

What is your capabilities in oilfield construction?

  • Onshore/Offshore process piping fabrication.
  • Structural supports and platforms.
  • Onshore/Offshore pipelines & flowlines.
  • Electrical & Instrumentation Installation.

What about your Safety Measures?

  • ISO 45001 Certified
  • Trained & Dedicated HSE Personnels
